### Tender Announcement - Electrical Equipment Replacement

#### Reference Information
* **Tender Title**: Electrical Equipment Replacement
* **Reference Number**: WS3482935876-Doc3487592742
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3482935876

#### Tender Details
* **Publication Date**: August 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2022, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: September 27, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 24, 2023
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Procurement Category**: CNST

#### Tender Description
This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the replacement of electrical power system construction services. The successful bidder will be selected based on the Lowest Price criterion.

#### Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Larocque, Cody (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: cody.larocque@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information
* **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13066827?extsite=MTMwNjY4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Apprentice
